member.name: M:MTE.MTEConversion.ConvertTerrainToMesh(UnityEngine.GameObject,MTE.TerrainConversionSettings)
member.summary: Convert a Unity terrain GameObject to a mesh-terrain.

member.name: P:MTE.TerrainConversionSettings.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets name of created mesh-terrain

member.name: P:MTE.TerrainConversionSettings.FileFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the file format of created mesh: *.obj or *.asset

member.name: P:MTE.TerrainConversionSettings.OutPutDir
member.summary: Gets or sets the absolute directory path that the mesh-terrain directory will be created in. It should be something like All generated contents of the mesh-terrain will be put in OutputDir/Name/. The directory should be a child directory of /Assets.

member.name: P:MTE.TerrainConversionSettings.ExportTrees
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the converter export trees on original Unity3D terrain. No effect if there is none.

member.name: P:MTE.TerrainConversionSettings.VertexCountAlongAnEdge
member.summary: Gets or sets the vertex count along an edge.
